title: Leave Insomniac Alone - Kinda Funny Games Daily 12.19.23
description:
This episode is sponsored by BetterHelp — go to http://betterhelp.com/kindafunny  to get 10% off your first month.

Greg and Blessing talk about the Insomniac leaks, Bethesda possibly not letting Obsidian make Fallout and Elder Scrolls, and more games coming from Dead Space's creator.

Time Stamps:
00:00:00 - Start
00:05:46 - Housekeeping
 - A new Kinda Funny Podcast is up about Marvel Studios and where does it all go from here. Youtube.com/KindaFunny
 - This is our last week in the office for the year. Kinda Funny will return in 2024.
       -  The Roper Report   -
00:09:42 - Insomniac hacker releases more than 1.3 million stolen files, including unannounced games info
00:36:01 - Obsidian co-founder says Bethesda rejected multiple Elder Scrolls spin-off proposals
00:44:27 - Dead Space co-creator Glen Schofield is teasing his next project
00:48:34 - Sony Patent Would See PlayStation Game Difficulty Adapt in Real-Time to Player Skill
00:52:38 - Activision Blizzard to end hybrid work for QA employees
00:57:29 - Pornhub's Most Popular Video Game Character In 2023 Was Chun-Li From... Fortnite?
